SELECT /* OrderMapper.selectByMemberId */ ORDER_ID , ORD_SEQ , ORD_PROC_SEQ , CLAIM_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_DATE , TOTAL_AMOUNT , STATUS FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
